title.rendered: Top 3 Reasons to Remodel Your Basement

content.rendered:
We get it. You’ve been on the fence about remodelling your basement because your friends and family are unsure if it’s worth it. If you’ve heard advice from friends and family but still remain on the fence, here are three important reasons why you should consider a remodel for your basement.

  1. Multipurpose Utility The creative and functional purposes for this space are endless! Ever wanted to build an office? What about a playroom for your children? Always thought about what it would be like to have an entertainment center? Whatever your desires and needs are, this space can be beautifully transformed to a multi-functional space if you invest your time and energy into a remodel.
  2. Return on Investment Yes, you will have to invest in your basement remodel. But research shows that your finished basements return over 70% of your original investment. Also, that return doesn’t include the satisfaction of your new multi-purpose space!
  3. Cost-Effective Compared to new home additions, a basement remodel can cost you a fraction of other home renovation costs. Also, besides making your basement more aesthetically pleasing, it increases the quality of life for all those who live there and will utilize the space!

Although it may be a big decision to decide to remodel your basement, it can definitely be a rewarding end result that will be useful to everyone in your home. Whether you are looking to remodel the area into a playroom, office, or entertainment center, Handyman Connection of York is here for you every step of the way. Give us a call today to get started or if you have any questions about your future basement project!
